# Neco-Arc-NX-Theme
Theme with Neco-Arc Type-Moon character for SwitchThemeInjector. Created from Neco-Arc sprites ripped from Melty Blood Type Lumina game.

### Screenshots
![Home Screen](screenshots/home.jpg "Home Screen")
![All Apps Menu](screenshots/apps.jpg "All Apps Menu")
![Lockscreen](screenshots/lockscreen.jpg "Lockscreen")
![User Page](screenshots/user.jpg "User Page")
![Settings](screenshots/settings.jpg "Settings")

### Used Layouts
* `Left All Apps Rounded (by M1ke)` (Apps menu) (fixed for 20.5.0 firmware)
* `Hanazono (by majutsushi)` (Home screen) (fixed for 20.5.0 firmware)
* `Banned (by Radorei)` (Lockscreen)
